SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.phone, u.avatar, u.status, u.last_login_time, u.last_login_ip, u.create_time, u.update_time, r.id as role_id, r.role_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND u.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
AND u.status = #{status}
ORDER BY u.create_time DESC

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.phone, u.avatar, u.status, u.last_login_time, u.last_login_ip, u.create_time, u.update_time, r.id as role_id, r.role_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
